name: raltp
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wb(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), w0), w3a(w1, w2, w3))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wb(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), w0), w3a(w1, w2, w3)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
